  include/imgpluginFreeImage.h
)

# Make sure the PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES variable is always defined

# Make sure the PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES variable is always defined
 set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES "" )

# For ease of use make a variable that has all files for this module
set( ALL_FILES ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} ${PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES} ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )




#******** END OF AUTOGENERATED CONTENT ********



add_library( imgpluginFreeImage ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} )
add_dependencies( imgpluginFreeImage gucefCORE gucefMT gucefIMAGE FreeImage )
target_link_libraries( imgpluginFreeImage gucefCORE gucefMT gucefIMAGE FreeImage )
set_target_properties( imgpluginFreeImage PROPERTIES COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "GUCEF_CODECPLUGIN_BUILD_MODULE" )
GUCEF_config_plugin( imgpluginFreeImage )
